title: S1 Ep52: Using role models in Somali schools
itunes:title: Using role models in Somali schools
description: How can Somalia's schools inspire kids to finish their education and learn about gender equality? A low-cost intervention uses role models with surprising success, says Munshi Sulaiman of BRAC.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
